content: beg of strap in back on fold being careful not to twist pull strap in front to opposite fold and tuck working end up to match the 3 sts closest to fold making sure that live loop is on the right add or pull out 1 row as needed slip_stitch through both sets of 3 sts to make seam on inside finish continuing with next rim st after join *single_crochet across to beg of strap single_crochet along the side of the strap until you reach rim again slip_stitch to first single_crochet of rim and fasten_off ** join yarn on opposite strap corner and repeat from * to ** weave in ends with tapestry needle abbreviations double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet st stitch repeat repeat slip_stitch slip_stitch round round © rachael lauritzen 2018
